page.title: 14Buildings in Langtoft.
page.content: In Langtoft we have 153 houses.The oldest houses are 300 to 386 years old and the newest houses are 5 to 8 years old.The materials used on houses are brick,chalk,plastic gutters,metal gutters,pantiles,slates,wood,glass and chimneypots.There is a big range of different houses in the village. There are detatched and semi detatched houses,bungalows and farm houses .In the village we have a School,a Church, Pub,P.O,a Restaurant and Hairdressers and other buildings.The names of the streets are Hillside Gardens, Council Row,Back Street,Front Street, Ratten Row,Church Lane,Accommodation Road, Sledmere Road,Cottam Lane, Kilham Bottom and Chapel Lane. Some houses are made of chalk,some of brick and some of brick and chalk. We have 2 monuments and a plaque.It is about the Floods of 1892 and 1657.
